body:
More like a "drama" flag, not an NTR flag. On the last page, bottom right, she's falling on the floor (ペタン sfx) sad/probably crying (ズー sfx), she's shaking on the bottom 2nd right frame (ビクッ) and asking "why" on the left one. Judging by the face on the 52nd page and Edward's excuses on 53th, she didn't expect him to cum inside her, and because it's the 19th century (page #5) it's not gonna be the "hey, honey, cum inside me, i'm on a pill" trick, because this kind of pills was invented in 20th century.

I'm also not sure about "rape" tag, because it's more like femdom in the beginning, she didn't "raped" him, he was speaking with hearts, which means he wasn't forced into sex.
Damn, I love  Maid-master relatioships, it's always such a turn on...
Oh fuck me I didnt see that page fuuuu
Hemm I kissed some NTR gonna happen
